history.proof: intros commutativity x y Hx Hy Hadd. unfold is_opposite. destruct (commutativity x y) as [H1 H2]. split. - auto. - split. + auto. + split. * auto. * rewrite commutativity. sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros commutativity x y Hx Hy Hadd. unfold is_opposite. unfold is_opposite in *. destruct (commutativity x y) as [H1 H2]. split. - auto. - split. + auto. + split. * auto. * rewrite commutativity. auto.
